data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 | iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 PB 6
data.actual_result: A part of the author name will be overlapped by the thumbnail.
data.expected_result: Author name and thumbnail shouldn't overlap each other.
data.short_description: Rich embed: Author name overlaps with thumbnail
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an rich embed with a bot or webhook - Add an author name and a thumbnail to this embed (note: don't add an image, otherwise thumbnail wouldn't be visible) - Make the author name very long (length depends on the display size) - Observe it with the iOS device
